short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The game is a labyrinth. Collect all the keys and find a way out of the maze.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The game is simply a labyrinth from which you need to find a way out. There are three levels of difficulty, differing in the size of the maze. To help the player, the game has a map of the entire maze, but it is not always available, which forces memory training.

Select the difficulty level and go through the maze.
To go through the labyrinth, you need to collect three keys and find the exit door from the labyrinth.
Control is carried out by pressing the left mouse button or touching the screen, as well as using the arrow keys.
